dct_title_s: Recentissima NOVI ORBIS Sive AMERICÆ SEPTENTRIONALIS et MERIDIONALIS TABULA
dct_description_sm: With place names in Terra Esonis. Title cartouche not colored.
Without place names in Terra Esonis. Title cartouche colored.

California as an island with indented northern coast. Island called Pararos close to western coast, and between 230-240 deg. W long. are 3 islands: la Vefina, Morges, and la Disgraciade. Terra Esonis, Yedso and Iaponiæ Ins. to northwest, and Nova Guinea, Insulæ Salomonis and Quiri Regio to southwest. Seems to be copy of DeWit map of same title. Title cartouche same as on his 1680 map and those of DeWit, Visscher, and others, with a native chief under an umbrella to left of title.
